blocks.name: isph
blocks.content: The predicate "is an inner product space." (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm isph(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  biadanii(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  phnv(c0)
  bianabs(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c0, ccphlo), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cnv), wb(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), wceq(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2)))
  nvop(c0, c3, cfv(cns, c0), c2)
  bitrd(wceq(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2)), wcel(c0, ccphlo), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))), wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), ccphlo))
  eleq1(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), ccphlo)
  syl5bb(wceq(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2)), wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), ccphlo), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))))
  mp3an(wb(wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), ccphlo), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cfv(cns, c0), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cpv, c0)
  fvex(cns, c0)
  fvexi(c2, cnmcv, c0)
  isphg(s0, s1, c3, universe, cfv(cns, c0), universe, c2, universe, c1)
  bafval(c1, c3, c0)
  syl5rbb(wceq(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2)), wa(wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  ralbidva(s0, c1, wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))), wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))))))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))), wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))
  eqeq1d(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  oveq2d(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  fveq2d(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))))
  nvmval(c0, cv(s0), c1, cv(s1), c4, c3, cfv(cns, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cns, c0))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2)), wcel(c0, cnv), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, co(cneg(nat1), cfv(cns, c0), cv(s1)))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cexp, nat2)))))), wcel(cop(cop(c3, cfv(cns, c0)), c2), cnv))

blocks.name: phpar2
blocks.content: The parallelogram law for an inner product space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm phpar2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cnsb, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2)))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  isph(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2))))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2)))), wceq(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq12d(co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, c5, cv(hs1))
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, c6, cv(hs1))
  oveq2d(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c4)
  eqeq12d(co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cexp, nat2))), co(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2)), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cfv(c4, c1), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, c3), cexp, nat2))), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq12d(co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), cexp, nat2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq2d(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1)), co(c1, c5, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, c5)
  oveq1d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, cv(hs1))), cexp, nat2, cfv(c4, co(c1, c6, c3)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))

thm ip1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cba, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cns, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdip, c7))
  -| wcel(c7, ccphlo)
  -| wcel(c0, c6)
  -| wcel(c2, c6)
  -| wcel(c4, c6)
} = {
  ip1ilem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, cfv(cnmcv, c7), nat1)
  eqid(cfv(cnmcv, c7))
  ax-1cn()
}

thm ip1i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ (((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c4)[+]((c0[c1](-u(1)[c5]c2))[c3]c4))=(2[×](c0[c3]c4))
  ⊣ c6 =(BaseSet ` c7)
  ⊣ c1 =(+v ` c7)
  ⊣ c5 =(.sOLD ` c7)
  ⊣ c3 =(.iOLD ` c7)
  ⊣ c7 ∈ CPreHilOLD
  ⊣ c0 ∈ c6
  ⊣ c2 ∈ c6
  ⊣ c4 ∈ c6
} = {
  ip1ilem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, (normCV ` c7), nat1)
  eqid((normCV ` c7))
  ax-1cn()
}

blocks.name: ipdiri
blocks.content: Distributive law for inner product. Equation I3 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipdiri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c5, c3), co(co(c0, c5, c3), caddc, co(c2, c5, c3))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c6))

blocks.name: ipasslem11

  syl(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, ci), cmul, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(cv(hs1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, co(c2, c3, c4)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  mp3an23(wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), cmul, ci), cmul, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(cv(hs1), cmul, co(ci, cmul, co(c2, c3, c4)))), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), cc))

  oveq2i(cv(hs1), cmul, co(co(ci, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(ci, cmul, co(c2, c3, c4)))

blocks.name: ipassi
blocks.content: Associative law for inner product. Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipassi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c1), c5, c3), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, c5, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cpv, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cns, c6))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cdip, c6))
  -| wcel(c6, ccphlo)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c1), c5, c3), co(c0, cmul, co(c1, c5, c3))))

blocks.content: Distributive law for inner product. Equation I3 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  ipdiri(c1, (BaseSet ` if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)), c3, c4, (+v ` if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)), (.iOLD ` if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)), if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >), (.sOLD ` if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)))
  eqid((BaseSet ` if(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)))

thm dipdi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), caddc, co(c1, c5, c4))))

} = {

  sylan(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  nvgcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
  simpr3(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  dipcj(c0, co(c3, c6, c4), c2, c1, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c5, c1), caddc, co(c4, c5, c1))), co(co(c1, c5, c3), caddc, co(c1, c5, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  phnv(c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c5, c1), caddc, co(c4, c5, c1))), co(co(c1, c5, c3), caddc, co(c1, c5, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, co(c3, c5, c1)), caddc, cfv(ccj, co(c4, c5, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))))

thm dipdi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))=((c1[c5]c3)[+](c1[c5]c4)))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(+v ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(.iOLD ` c0)
} = {
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), (c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))=((c1[c5]c3)[+](c1[c5]c4)), (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3com13(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  id((c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3eqtr3d((c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), ((c1[c5]c3)[+](c1[c5]c4)), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1)), (* `((c3[c5]c1)[+](c4[c5]c1))), (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))
  fveq2d(ccj, ((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1), ((c3[c5]c1)[+](c4[c5]c1)), (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))
  sylan2(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1)=((c3[c5]c1)[+](c4[c5]c1)), (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3com12(c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, (c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  id((c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  dipdir(c0, c3, c2, c4, c1, c6, c5)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1))=(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1))=(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2)
  3com23(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2)
  nvgcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  dipcj(c0, (c3[c6]c4), c2, c1, c5)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (* `((c3[c5]c1)[+](c4[c5]c1)))=((c1[c5]c3)[+](c1[c5]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  phnv(c0)
  eqtrd((* `((c3[c5]c1)[+](c4[c5]c1))), ((c1[c5]c3)[+](c1[c5]c4)), ((* `(c3[c5]c1))[+](* `(c4[c5]c1))), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))
  cjaddd((c3[c5]c1), (c4[c5]c1), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, (c3[c5]c1)∈ ℂ)
  dipcl(c0, c3, c2, c1, c5)
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, (c4[c5]c1)∈ ℂ)
  dipcl(c0, c4, c2, c1, c5)
  oveq12d((* `(c3[c5]c1)), caddc, (* `(c4[c5]c1)), (c1[c5]c3), (c1[c5]c4), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2)))

thm ip2dii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(co(c0, c3, c4), caddc, co(c2, c3, c5)), caddc, co(co(c0, c3, c5), caddc, co(c2, c3, c4))))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cba, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpv, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdip, c7))
  -| wcel(c7, ccphlo)
  -| wcel(c0, c6)
  -| wcel(c2, c6)
  -| wcel(c4, c6)
  -| wcel(c5, c6)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(co(c0, c3, c4), caddc, co(c2, c3, c5)), caddc, co(co(c0, c3, c5), caddc, co(c2, c3, c4))), co(co(c0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), caddc, co(c2, c3, co(c4, c1, c5))), co(co(co(c0, c3, c4), caddc, co(c0, c3, c5)), caddc, co(co(c2, c3, c4), caddc, co(c2, c3, c5))))
  oveq12i(co(c0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), caddc, co(c2, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(c0, c3, c4), caddc, co(c0, c3, c5)), co(co(c2, c3, c4), caddc, co(c2, c3, c5)))
  mp2an(wceq(co(c0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(c0, c3, c4), caddc, co(c0, c3, c5))), wcel(c7, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c4, c6), wcel(c5, c6)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c4, c6), wcel(c5, c6))
  dipdi(c7, c0, c6, c4, c5, c3, c1)
  mp2an(wceq(co(c2, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(c2, c3, c4), caddc, co(c2, c3, c5))), wcel(c7, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c2, c6), wcel(c4, c6), wcel(c5, c6)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c2, c6), wcel(c4, c6), wcel(c5, c6))
  dipdi(c7, c2, c6, c4, c5, c3, c1)
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), co(co(c0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), caddc, co(c2, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)))), wcel(c7, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c6), wcel(co(c4, c1, c5), c6)))
  3pm3.2i(wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c2, c6), wcel(co(c4, c1, c5), c6))
  mp3an(wcel(co(c4, c1, c5), c6), wcel(c7, cnv), wcel(c4, c6), wcel(c5, c6))
  nvgcl(c7, c4, c6, c5, c1)
  dipdir(c7, c0, c6, c2, co(c4, c1, c5), c1, c3)
  add42i(co(c0, c3, c4), co(c2, c3, c5), co(c0, c3, c5), co(c2, c3, c4))
  mp3an(wcel(co(c0, c3, c4), cc), wcel(c7, cnv), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c4, c6))
  dipcl(c7, c0, c6, c4, c3)
  mp3an(wcel(co(c2, c3, c5), cc), wcel(c7, cnv), wcel(c2, c6), wcel(c5, c6))
  dipcl(c7, c2, c6, c5, c3)
  mp3an(wcel(co(c0, c3, c5), cc), wcel(c7, cnv), wcel(c0, c6), wcel(c5, c6))
  dipcl(c7, c0, c6, c5, c3)
  mp3an(wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), cc), wcel(c7, cnv), wcel(c2, c6), wcel(c4, c6))
  phnvi(c7)

blocks.name: dipass
blocks.content: Associative law for inner product. Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm dipass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c2), c6, c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, c6, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cdip, c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c2), c6, c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, c6, c4))))
  dedth(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo), wi(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c2), c6, c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, c6, c4)))), wi(w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))))), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cns, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c2), cfv(cdip, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cfv(cdip, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c4)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c2), c6, c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, c6, c4))), w3a(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))))), wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cns, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c2), cfv(cdip, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c4), co(c1, cmul, co(c2, cfv(cdip, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), c4))))
  3anbi23d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3), wcel(c2, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))), wcel(c4, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo)))))
  eleq2d(c2, c3, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))))
  eleq2d(c4, c3, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))))
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(cba, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))), cfv(cba, c0), wceq(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo))))
  fveq2(c0, cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, ccphlo)), cba)

blocks.content: "Associative" law for second argument of inner product (compare ~ dipass ). (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm dipassr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cns, c0))

} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4)), cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1)), cfv(ccj, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, c5, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))

  sylan2b(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1), co(c3, cmul, co(c4, c5, c1))), w3a(wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anrot(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))
  dipass(c0, c3, c4, c2, c1, c6, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(co(c3, c6, c4), c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  nvscl(c0, c3, c4, c2, c6)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))
  dipcj(c0, co(c3, c6, c4), c2, c1, c5)
  sylan(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccj, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, c5, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  phnv(c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(ccj, co(c3, cmul, co(c4, c5, c1))), co(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c4, c5, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))
  cjmuld(c3, co(c4, c5, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c4, c5, c1), cc))
  3com23(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c4, c5, c1), cc))
  dipcl(c0, c4, c2, c1, c5)
  oveq2d(cfv(ccj, c3), cmul, cfv(ccj, co(c4, c5, c1)), co(c1, c5, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))

thm dipassr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))=((* ` c3)[×](c1[c5]c4)))
  ⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(.iOLD ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), ((* ` c3)[×](c1[c5]c4)), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1)), (* `(c3[×](c4[c5]c1))), (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  fveq2d(ccj, ((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1), (c3[×](c4[c5]c1)), (c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  sylan2b(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1)=(c3[×](c4[c5]c1)), (c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3anrot(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2)
  dipass(c0, c3, c4, c2, c1, c6, c5)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1))=(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (* `((c3[c6]c4)[c5]c1))=(c1[c5](c3[c6]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2)
  nvscl(c0, c3, c4, c2, c6)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2)
  dipcj(c0, (c3[c6]c4), c2, c1, c5)
  sylan(c0 ∈ CPreHilOLD, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2), (* `(c3[×](c4[c5]c1)))=((* ` c3)[×](c1[c5]c4)), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  phnv(c0)
  eqtrd((* `(c3[×](c4[c5]c1))), ((* ` c3)[×](c1[c5]c4)), ((* ` c3)[×](* `(c4[c5]c1))), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  cjmuld(c3, (c4[c5]c1), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  simpr2(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2)
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2, (c4[c5]c1)∈ ℂ)
  3com23(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c4[c5]c1)∈ ℂ)
  dipcl(c0, c4, c2, c1, c5)
  oveq2d((* ` c3), cmul, (* `(c4[c5]c1)), (c1[c5]c4), (c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ c2, (* `(c4[c5]c1))=(c1[c5]c4))
  3com23(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (* `(c4[c5]c1))=(c1[c5]c4))
  dipcj(c0, c4, c2, c1, c5)
}

thm dipassr2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(cfv(ccj, c3), c6, c4)), co(c3, cmul, co(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cdip, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c1, c5, co(cfv(ccj, c3), c6, c4)), co(c3, cmul, co(c1, c5, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c3)), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl3anr2(wcel(c0, ccphlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(cfv(ccj, c3), c6, c4)), co(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c3)), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4))), wcel(cfv(ccj, c3), cc))
  cjcl(c3)
  dipassr(c0, c1, c2, cfv(ccj, c3), c4, c5, c6)
  oveq1d(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c3)), cmul, co(c1, c5, c4), c3, wa(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccphlo), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(cfv(ccj, cfv(ccj, c3)), c3))

blocks.name: pythi
blocks.content: The Pythagorean theorem for an arbitrary complex inner product (pre-Hilbert) space ` U ` . The square of the norm of the sum of two orthogonal vectors (i.e. whose inner product is 0) is the sum of the squares of their norms. Problem 2 in [Kreyszig] p. 135. This is Metamath 100 proof #4. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: sii
blocks.content: Schwarz inequality. Part of Lemma 3-2.1(a) of [Kreyszig] p. 137. This is also called the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality by some authors and Bunjakovaskij-Cauchy-Schwarz inequality by others. See also theorems ~ bcseqi , ~ bcsiALT , ~ bcsiHIL , ~ csbren . This is Metamath 100 proof #78. (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm sii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c0, c3, c2)), cle, co(cfv(c4, c0), cmul, cfv(c4, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cba, c5))

  ⊣ c1 =(BaseSet ` c5)

  breq12d((abs `(c0[c3]c2)), cle, ((c4 ` c0)[×](c4 ` c2)), (abs `(if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5))[c3]c2)), ((c4 ` if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)))[×](c4 ` c2)), c0 = if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)))
  fvoveq1(c0, if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)), cabs, c3, c2)
  oveq1d((c4 ` c0), cmul, (c4 ` c2), (c4 ` if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5))), c0 = if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)))
  fveq2(c0, if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)), c4)
  breq12d((abs `(if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5))[c3]c2)), cle, ((c4 ` if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)))[×](c4 ` c2)), (abs `(if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5))[c3]if(c2 ∈ c1, c2,(0vec ` c5)))), ((c4 ` if(c0 ∈ c1, c0,(0vec ` c5)))[×](c4 ` if(c2 ∈ c1, c2,(0vec ` c5)))), c2 = if(c2 ∈ c1, c2,(0vec ` c5)))

blocks.name: ipblnfi
blocks.content: A function ` F ` generated by varying the first argument of an inner product (with its second argument a fixed vector ` A ` ) is a bounded linear functional, i.e. a bounded linear operator from the vector space to ` CC ` . (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: ip2eqi
blocks.content: Two vectors are equal iff their inner products with all other vectors are equal. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c0), cmin, co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c2)), nat0), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), cfv(cn0v, c4)), wceq(co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2)), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2)), nat0, co(co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c0), cmin, co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))

  eqid(cfv(cn0v, c4))

  oveq2(c0, c2, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c0), co(co(c0, cfv(cnsb, c4), c2), c3, c2))

blocks.name: phoeqi
blocks.content: A condition implying that two operators are equal. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm phoeqi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2)), wb(wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wceq(c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdip, c5))
  -| wcel(c5, ccphlo)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wceq(c0, c3), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))))
  ralcom(s0, s1, c2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))
  bitr4d(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2)), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))), wceq(c0, c3), wral(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))
  anandirs(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))
  syl2an(wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wf(c3, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(s1))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), c2))
  ffvelrn(c0, c1, c2, cv(s1))
  ffvelrn(c3, c1, c2, cv(s1))
  ip2eqi(s0, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c2, cfv(c3, cv(s1)), c4, c5)
  syl2an(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c3), wral(s1, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(s1))))), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(c3, c1))
  ffn(c0, c1, c2)
  ffn(c3, c1, c2)
  eqfnfv(s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c1, c2))
  diff.wf.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.wf.s(s1, c3, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c3, cv(s1))

  an4s(wf(cv(s0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c0, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), c4, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c0, wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), c4, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
